thread.title: IMF Decision Rattles Yuan Anew
thread.title_full: IMF Decision Rattles Yuan Anew - WSJ

author: Anjani Trivedi
title: IMF Decision Rattles Yuan Anew
text:
China’s yuan fell after the International Monetary Fund dealt a setback to the currency’s role on the global stage, breaking a streak of stability earlier this week.
On Thursday, the central bank, defying market sentiment, set the daily reference rate, or fix, sharply stronger than in previous days at 6.3915 per U.S. dollar. That’s 0.08%...
